original_title: 大麻じゃなくても良いけれど
overview: Three high school students are running through their adolescence, feeling frustrated and empty at the reality of being 18 years old. The film depicts the three days of their lives, intertwining various episodes around a plot to steal marijuana that grows in a house's garden. They play mahjong, pick up girls, become gay, and no matter what they do, they cannot get enough.
title: Not Only The Grass
